text: I order pizza hut periodically through delivery service. Theyre always on time. Food is hot and amazing. Just got the chicken parm sandwich for the first time and its fire. name: Robin Jackson
text: Service terrible, they got part of the order wrong, and not so great customer service. Asked for sticks to come out before pizza, and was given it all at once. Not what we asked for! Will not be returning or ordering there until full service is back.

name: Jacob E
text: Great people, great food, and good deals.  I love ordering through the app.  I received the wrong pizza a couple of weeks ago, and they let me keep the wrong one to feed my "starving" kids while they whipped up another.  They also threw in a free order of breadsticks a different time

name: Stacy Massaway
text: We were seated immediately upon arriving. Our waitress was Sam who was prompt with drinks/appetizers even with our pizza although it wasn't the best her service was much appreciated we even seen her bringing out other waitstaff orders who just stood around!!!!

name: Richards roosters
text:
The best pan pizza. The best chocolate chip pizza. The cinnamon rolls were drenched in frosting way to rich but I'd go back Ll day every day
The staff was polite and professional

name: Jennifer Compo
text: I ordered online. The pizzas were ready exactly on time. Very nice , hard working young guy at the counter, seemed to love his job. Refreshing! Oh , and THE BEST deep dish crust pizza on the planet!!

name: Lana
text:
I seem to always have trouble getting my order done correctly the first time, even if I order it online and I call to make sure they get it correct. :-/
Usually their bread sticks are much better/fresher when you dine in, so there's that.
